  • All Classes
 

All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    Consumable
    Stores information regarding a consumable item in game.
    ConsumableReader
    Allows for the reading of the consumables.yaml in the resources folder
    ConsumableTest
    Junit tests for consumables
    CrewClass
    Potential classes for crew members
    CrewMember
    Stores information regarding a single crew member including their name, class, current health, hunger, tiredness and action points, and whether or not they have the space plague.
    CrewMemberExtended
    Extends the CrewMember class to also store a link to an image
    CrewMemberImages
    Allows for the fetching of images for crew member
    CrewMemberTest
    Junit tests for crew members
    CrewSelection
    GUI for crew selection Allows player to create crew member and add them to the ship's crew
    CureItem
    Allows the creation of cure items for removing the space plague from Crew Members.
    CureItemTest
    Junit tests for cure items
    EndingScreen
    GUI to display the ending screen of the game GUI displays ending screen message depending on type of end game state
    ErrorWindow
    The error screen displayed if a fatal error has been encountered
    FoodItem
    Allows the creation of food items for decreasing a crew members hunger.
    FoodItemTest
    Junit tests for food items
    GameEnviroment
    Allows the game to be played through a command line
    GameState
    Stores information regarding the current state of the game such as the current and end day, and the number of parts that are needed and have been found.
    GameStateTest
    Junit tests for game state
    GUIImage
    Stores information regarding an image for use in the GUI
    MainMenuScreen
    The initial screen displayed when the game is started
    MainScreen
    GUI for the Main Screen of the game Displays options; travel to new planet, search the planet, go to outpost, view crew members/ access inventory, save game, load game, transition to new day, quit.
    MedicalItem
    Allows the creation of medical items for increasing a crew members health.
    MedicalItemTest
    Junit tests for medical items
    Outpost
    Stores information regarding the outpost at which the player can purchase items.
    OutpostScreen
    GUI for Outpost Screen Allows the player to purchase items from the outpost using credits
    OutpostTest
    Junit tests for Outpost
    PilotScreen
    GUI for the pilot screen Allows the player to select pilots and travel to a new planet
    Planet
    Stores information regarding a single planet including its name, description, whether or not it has a part, has been searched, and has had its part found.
    PlanetExtended
    Extends the planet class to allow for an image of the planet
    PlanetFindableObjects
    Potential items found on a planet
    PlanetSearchOutput
    Contains information regarding the item found when searching a planet Used by CrewMember when searchPlanet() is called
    PlanetSearchScreen
    GUI for the Planet Search Screen Displays the search results from searching the planet
    PlanetTest
    Junit tests for planets
    PossibleEndings
    Potential endings that the player might reach
    RandomEvent
    Implements random events that occur when a day is transitioned
    RandomEventOutput
    Contains a random event that occurred and the crew member involved Should only be used by the RandomEvent class
    RandomEventTest
    Junit tests for random events
    RandomEventTypes
    Contains the possible random events that may occur on a day transition
    RepairShields
    GUI for the repair shields screen Allows the player to select a crew member to repair the ship's shields
    RestScreen
    GUI for Rest Screen GUI Allows the player to select crew members to rest
    SaveGame
    Allows player to save the current game state and load game saves
    Score
    Determines the final score at the end of the game
    ScoreTest  
    Ship
    Stores information regarding the ship, the current crew, and the items held
    ShipTest
    Junit tests for ship
    StartApplication
    Main call method to start game
    StartupScreen
    GUI for startup Screen Displays game introduction and allows player to name ship and set the number of days they want to play
    StatusScreen
    GUI for status screen Displays the stats of the crew members Gives options for using item, repair shields, and rest crew member
    TransitionDayScreen
    GUI for Transition Day Screen Displays list of crew members that have died Displays a random event that has occurred
    UseItemScreen
    GUI for Use Item Screen Allows the player to use an inventory item on a crew member
